metadata.name: Sad Dude
metadata.description:
There once was a guy named Sad Dude,
Who always felt quite blue and subdued.
He'd sigh and he'd mope,
And he just couldn't cope,
With the weight of his melancholy mood.

Sometimes he'd feel so red and hot,
As if his sadness was all he'd got.
His heart felt heavy and tight,
As he tried to make things right,
But his sadness just wouldn't be fought.

So Sad Dude went through life feeling down,
Wishing he could turn things around.
He tried to be happy. He tried to support,
But his sadness just wouldn't go away,
Leaving him feeling like he might drown.

But then one day, Sad Dude found a friend,
Who listened to him and helped him mend.
They talked and laughed and played,
And Sad Dude's sadness slowly faded,
Leaving him feeling joy and love again.
